title: Romantic Gili Air Pool Villa Escape with Daily Dining
description: Discover a romantic getaway at Ke Rensia Villas Gili Air, the closest of the Gili Islands to Lombok. Considered the Gili Island with the best beaches, Gili Air is a secluded spot for snorkelling, surfing and sunrise yoga and a great alternative to Bali. Includes daily à la carte breakfast and your choice of daily à la carte lunch dinner, use of bicycles for exploring the island and more.
offer_address: Gili Air, Gili Indah, Pemenang, Kabupaten Lombok Utara, Nusa Tenggara Bar. 83352, Indonesia
